pointOfView.fromStatement: Traditional AI tools require extensive coding and data science expertise, limiting adoption to technical teams
pointOfView.toStatement: AI should be accessible to business users through natural language interfaces and pre-built workflows

content.newOpportunity: Democratize AI capabilities by enabling business users to build, deploy, and manage AI workflows without code, creating a new category of 'Citizen AI Development'

categoryNameAndDefinition.name: Citizen AI Development Platform
categoryNameAndDefinition.definition: A no-code platform that empowers business users to create, deploy, and manage enterprise-grade AI workflows using natural language and visual interfaces, without requiring data science or engineering expertise

content.manifesto: We believe AI should be a tool for everyone, not just data scientists. Every business user should have the power to automate their workflows, generate insights, and make data-driven decisions without waiting for technical teams. The future of AI is not in complexity, but in accessibility.

targetMarketCharacteristics.summary: Mid-market to Enterprise companies ($50M-$1B revenue) undergoing digital transformation with distributed business teams seeking to democratize AI capabilities
targetMarketCharacteristics.firmographic: Companies with 200-5000 employees, B2B focus, annual revenue $50M-$1B, technology budget >$5M, 3+ business units
targetMarketCharacteristics.technographic: Cloud-first infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP), existing SaaS tools (Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack), API-first architecture, moderate technical maturity
targetMarketCharacteristics.behavioral: Active digital transformation initiatives, history of adopting no-code/low-code tools, collaborative work culture, data-driven decision making, willingness to experiment with emerging technologies
targetMarketCharacteristics.implementationReadiness: Established IT governance, dedicated transformation budget, executive sponsorship for innovation, cross-functional collaboration mechanisms, 3-6 month implementation timeline tolerance
